tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Sarita was probably the first one to point out and suggest a systematic treatment of my 20-year-old allergy problem. She was patient with the tests and ensured I was not put on ad-hoc medication without proper diagnosis. Her line of treatment is scientific and patient-friendly. Really happy to report that after suffering for over 20 years with allergies, having done everything under the sun to fight it, I have finally found a way to control it without having to cope with severe side effects of heavy steroids. Highly recommend her for allergies - diagnosis and treatment. Also, both my kids (7 years and 6 months) love her. She is an amazing pediatrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My 10 year wait is finally over, now that I met dr Sharma. She is kind patient and very experienced. She was attentive towards my child& and heard all his complaints rather patiently 
Dr Sharma is ************* *** well versed in the intricacies of Pediatric treatments.

She's very patient doctor who listens to the problems and gives practical guidance of immense importance. She explained the disease process in my language and explained medication nicely. Our son is remaining healthy, thanks again to a very pleasant doctor
Dr Sharma is thorough and always makes me as parent understand what the issue is and how to deal with it
She is very positive, friendly and warm doctor. Her diagnosis is spot on. Highly recommend her. It’s easy to approach her.
My child was having recurring fever...she asked about symptoms in depth and did good analysis.. satisfied with her

Dr Sarita Sharma is very friendly and coordial. Visited for vaccination of my 5 year old son. The clinic is located in a convenient location very near to aurobindo marg opp to mother's international school gate with ample roadside parking.

Dr. Sarita is very understanding and humble person. She quickly diagnosed my son's problem and her medcation started giving relief to him in two dozes only. Very precise and accurate and patient in listening to the problem thoroughly.
The doctor is friendly and has lots of patience even with fussy kids who refuse to go to strangers and refuse to take medicines.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My child was suffering from high fever as per doctor observation totally unsatisfied service. Call back
